name: Size Does Matter!
description:
Made with the free trial of construct 3 (reason why it isn't very long)

My first game ever, made it for the "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023"

i tried to do something with the theme and i think it came out pretty cool even though it's kinda basic

graphics isnt the best but for my first game i accept this (+ im not good at art so idk)

tutorial is in the game so dw about "learning" how to play
